character.name: Wade
description: Your trend analyst. Manipulates <c=keyword>odds</c> and <c=keyword>probabilities</c> to give himself an edge in battle.

LuckyDrive.name: Lucky Drive
LuckyDrive.description: While you have positive <c=status>ODDS</c>, add {0} damage to all attacks. After playing a card with an attack, <c=action>roll</c>.

DiceBag.name: DICE BAG
DiceBag.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 <c=card>Spare Dice</c>.

FuzzyDice.name: FUZZY DICE
FuzzyDice.description: The first time you <c=action>roll</c> each turn, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

LuckyPenny.name: LUCKY PENNY
LuckyPenny.description: If you end your turn with negative <c=status>ODDS</c>, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

PressedClover.name: PRESSED CLOVER
PressedClover.description: The first 2 times you <c=action>roll</c> each turn, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>. <c=downside>Your odds are hidden.</c>
